pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Openpyxl Image LoaderOpenpyxl wrapper that gets images from cells## Requirements* [openpyxl](https://pypi.org/project/openpyxl/)## Usage```pythonfrom openpyxl import load_workbookfrom openpyxl_image_loader import SheetImageLoader# Load your workbook and sheet as you want, for examplewb = load_workbook('path_to_file.xlsx')sheet = wb['required_sheet']# Put your sheet in the loaderimage_loader = SheetImageLoader(sheet)# And get image from specified cellimage = image_loader.get('A3')# Image now is a Pillow image, so you can do the followingimage.show()# Ask if there's an image in a cellif image_loader.image_in('A4): print("Got it!")```
